channel.title: We Talk Nerd Podcast
channel.description: Tune in as Brandon, Andrew and Rob talk about current nerd culture. Every week we dive into subjects like games, movies, tv and more!
channel.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
channel.itunes:keywords: Gaming, Movies, TV, News, Nerd, Culture

item.title: We Talk WoW
item.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
item.itunes:summary: This week Jared is back to talk about some new content in WoW and we review some games and play 20 questions!
item.itunes:subtitle: This week Jared is back to talk about some new content in WoW and we review some games and play 20 questions!
item.description: This week Jared is back to talk about some new content in WoW and we review some games and play 20 questions!

item.title: We Talk God of War
item.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
item.itunes:summary: This week we talk the largest game out right now, God of War. We also talk about the new Destiny 2 DLC and what to expect. And our final Infinity Comic review before the big movie 10 years in the making!

item.title: Sea of Thieves Open Beta? Maybe
item.itunes:author: We Talk Nerd
item.itunes:summary: We bring you the latest in gaming news as well as speculation on if Sea of Thieves will be a public beta this weekend. With some movie and tv news and a review for the Hulu show Future Man, and 20 questions is back.
